translation.en: Oh, I haven't seen this.
Oh, I love this cat!
Oh my god, Mai. Do something about your hair.
I like it this way.
Seriously, does everything have to be a robot with you?
translation.it: Dev'essere davvero tutto robotico con te?

translation.en: -Oh, come on. It's cute. -[brush laughs]
I'll do it myself.
You know, it's not going to kill you to accept a little help.
translation.it: Non ti farebbe male farti aiutare, ogni tanto.

translation.en: [Mai's mother] You're not in this alone.
Somebody needs a makeover!
[Mai] Get this-- Get off me.
Oh, stop being so dramatic. I can do it myself!
translation.it: - Su, basta drammi. - Faccio da sola!

translation.en: -Happy? -You look nice, Mai.
[brush] Yeah, cool. I'll be waiting here in the car.
-Off you go. -Goodbye. See ya.
[robot] Voilà.
[girl] You can see monkey fighters.
[male voice over P.A.] Welcome to IQ Robotic.
Friendly reminder: all children must be accompanied by an adult.
translation.it: LANCIO GEN 6 I bambini devono essere accompagnati.

translation.en: [Mai's mother] Aren't you so excited?
[Mai] You didn't tell me there was gonna be a line.
translation.it: Non mi avevi detto della fila.

translation.en: Come on, Mai. The new Gen 6 is going to make this old thing obsolete.
translation.it: Andiamo, la Gen 6 renderà questo completamente obsoleto.

translation.en: -[Mai's mother] Sorry. -Not a problem.
The Gen 6's slightly bigger screen will complete you emotionally
translation.it: Lo schermo poco più grande della Gen 6 fornirà

translation.en: -in ways I never could. -[gasps]
It's cool, you love robots more than you love me.
translation.it: Bene, preferisci i robot a me.

translation.en: Totally get it.
-What's that honey? -[grunts]
Just super excited about the awesome robots, mom.
translation.it: Sono solo emozionata per questi fantastici robot.

translation.en: -Mom. Mom. Molly. Mom! -Mm-hmm?
Is it cool if I go check out the stadium? Oh, it's got a headphone jack.
translation.it: - Posso andare a vedere lo stadio? - Ha pure un jack per le cuffie.

translation.en: -[man moans] -My bad.
My shoes.
[Mai] Sorry, but not sorry.
[Mai] Sorry.
Excuse me, miss. You appear to be going down the up escalator.
translation.it: Mi scusi. Pare stia scendendo dalle scale mobili per salire.

translation.en: May I suggest instead you go up the up escalator
translation.it: Posso suggerire di usare queste per salire

translation.en: or down the down es--
No, no. No, thank you.
Oh, please don't do that. No.
Now, this is not being regular.
-Can we just talk about this? -[Mai] Shut it.
[flying robot] Why don't we talk to my supervisor?
translation.it: Perché non dirlo al mio supervisore?

translation.en: [announcer over P.A.] IQ Robotic presents Tectonic Activity
translation.it: Ecco a voi "Attività Tettonica" in una sfida all'ultimo sangue.

translation.en: facing up against the Wild Chickens for 20 rounds. Play-off madness!
translation.it: Ecco a voi "Attività Tettonica" in una sfida all'ultimo sangue. ORA DEL LASER

translation.en: -No, wait. -Okay.
Move, move. Come on.
Ma'am, if you would refer to our sales brochure
you will find that a number of models incorporate amazing personal transportation options.
translation.it: vedrà che esistono modelli con opzioni di trasporto incorporato.

translation.en: I, however, am not one!
translation.it: Io non sono uno di quelli.

translation.en: [flying robot] Falling down!
Friendly reminder, all children must be accompanied by an adult.
translation.it: Ricordiamo che i bambini devono essere accompagnati.

translation.en: -You're coming with me, young lady. -What?
You're just making it harder for yourself. -And me. -[electricity arcing]
translation.it: Sta solo peggiorando le cose per me e per lei.

translation.en: Hey, get back here you little...
-[siren whooping] -I said-- What?
You're not allowed in there. Uh...
[security robot] Oh, fudge.
[man in the background] The first true learning AI--
translation.it: - La prima IA che impara... - Non la prima.

translation.en: -[robot] Not the first. -Yes, not the first.
translation.it: - La prima IA che impara... - Non la prima. Non la prima, ma la meglio riuscita.

translation.en: But we've done it right this time.
translation.it: Non la prima, ma la meglio riuscita.

translation.en: -Great, let's get him out of here. -No!
He has too much to learn before he is ready for the job
translation.it: Ha tanto da imparare per essere pronta,

translation.en: we so desperately need him to perform.
Okay, gotta go.
You are my last and best hope. My project 77.
translation.it: Sei la mia ultima e migliore speranza, progetto 77.

translation.en: -You said, "remind me at two o'clock." -You're not perfect.
translation.it: - Dovevo ricordarglielo alle due... - Non sei perfetto.

translation.en: But then perfect is the enemy of good. Isn't it?
translation.it: Ma la perfezione è nemica del buono. Non è così?

translation.en: -Because it's two o'clock. -Oh, my--
translation.it: - E ora sono le due. - Ehi, dammi un minuto.

translation.en: Would you just give me a minute? Okay? One minute!
translation.it: - E ora sono le due. - Ehi, dammi un minuto. Hai idea di quanto sia pericoloso ciò che abbiamo costruito?

translation.en: Do you have any idea how dangerous what we built is?
translation.it: Hai idea di quanto sia pericoloso ciò che abbiamo costruito?

translation.en: It's kind of a big deal. Let me check. Yeah. It's one of the biggest deals ever.
translation.it: È una cosa seria. Sì, è una cosa serissima.

translation.en: [robot] How about a "thanks for the reminder, Alfredo"? [scientist] Thank you for the reminder. I know.
translation.it: - Potresti anche ringraziarmi. - Hai ragione, grazie, Alfredo.

translation.en: -[gasps] -[robot] Hello.
-Wha-- Hey! Oh my God. -What's your name?
[Mai] Stupid robot.
[robot] Hello, Stupid Robot. What's this for?
No, you're the stupid robot.
translation.it: No, sei tu lo stupido robot.

translation.en: [robot] I'm the stupid robot? Is Dr. Rice coming back?
translation.it: Sono io? Quando torna il Dr. Rice?

translation.en: -Come on. Let go of my bag. -Okay.
-Woah, what are you doing? -I'm following you.
That is super creepy.
I mean, really. What are you thinking?
We hang out, become best buds, take on the world,
translation.it: Che diventeremo amici, conquisteremo il mondo

translation.en: share a deep and moving journey of discovery together?
translation.it: e condivideremo i nostri viaggi di scoperta?

translation.en: -Okay. -Yeah, you are delusional.
-[siren chirps] -[security robot] Hey! You're definitely not allowed in there sweetheart.
-I'm not your-- -Quit squirming.
-[Mai] My backpack! I need it! -[security robot] Come on, now.
[announcer over P.A.] Ladies and gentlemen,
members of the press, please welcome to the stage
translation.it: Signore e signori, giornalisti, date il benvenuto sul palco all'a.d. e co-fondatore della IQ Robotic

translation.en: co-founder and CEO of IQ Robotic,
translation.it: date il benvenuto sul palco all'a.d. e co-fondatore della IQ Robotic

translation.en: Let's give them a show.
-Mom, can we go now? -Ah!
Shh! Honey, Mommy needs to see this.
[Justin] Can you hear me all right? How are you doing?
Great! Great!
[girl in the crowd] I love you!
translation.it: IL NOSTRO MODELLO PIÙ ELEGANTE PROCESSORE LAMPO SQF-1

translation.en: Hey, check out those tech specs, huh? Pretty impressive.
Even I'm impressed and I work here, so... [chuckles]
translation.it: Anche io ne sono colpito, e lavoro qui.

translation.en: Folks, this year's lineup is kinda perfect if I do say so myself.
translation.it: Quest'anno abbiamo un prodotto fantastico, ve l'assicuro.

translation.en: It really is. But I've got a question.
Are you guys ready to see the next big thing?
translation.it: voi siete pronti per il futuro?

translation.en: -[crowd exclaims] -Yeah?
Well in that case, let me just say this, what is past is prologue, folks.
translation.it: In questo caso, diciamo che il passato era il prologo.

translation.en: And this is the beginning of a new world.
translation.it: E questo è l'inizio di un mondo nuovo.

translation.en: -I believe, a better world. -[crowd applauds]
[Justin] Brought to you by the geniuses here at the IQ Robotic. And I am super proud of what we've accomplished here.
translation.it: Presentato dai geni della IQ Robotic, e di cui vado molto orgoglioso.

translation.en: The way I see it, this is the last Q-Bot you will ever need.
translation.it: Per come la vedo io, questo è l'ultimo Q-Bot di cui avrete mai bisogno.

translation.en: -[man in the crowd] Yeah! -So, let's hear it for the new Gen 6!
translation.it: Quindi... un applauso per la nuova Gen 6.

translation.en: [Justin] Yeah.
I know, right? Gorgeous!
Well, this is it folks. This is my end game.
translation.it: Ci siamo, gente. Siamo alla resa dei conti. Tutto il mio lavoro mi ha portato qui,

translation.en: Everything I have ever done has led up to this moment.
translation.it: Siamo alla resa dei conti. Tutto il mio lavoro mi ha portato qui,

translation.en: To this wonder of technology.
And boy, is it a winner!
Hey, but you know who the real winners are?
translation.it: Ma sapete chi sono i veri vincitori?

translation.en: It's all of you.
-[crowd cheers] -Yes, it is us.
I love him!
He really gets me.
-[crowd continues cheering] -Please.
Ladies and gentlemen, we've entered an age
translation.it: Signore e signori, siamo entrati in un'era di connettività e confort

translation.en: of unprecedented convenience and connectivity.
translation.it: Signore e signori, siamo entrati in un'era di connettività e confort senza precedenti: una vera comunità globale, possibile grazie ai Q-Bot.

translation.en: A real global community, facilitated by the IQ Robotic Q-Bots.
translation.it: senza precedenti: una vera comunità globale, possibile grazie ai Q-Bot.

translation.en: -And listen... -[crowd cheering] I know, I know.
translation.it: E state a sentire... Lo so.

translation.en: I'm not embarrassed to say, I want all of you addicted to these guys.
translation.it: Non mi imbarazza dire che voglio che ne siate tutti dipendenti.

translation.en: Why not, right?
They're going to change the world.
Thank you!
Ladies and gentlemen, Justin Pin thanks your for your support.
translation.it: Signore e signori, Justin Pin. Grazie per il sostegno.

translation.en: To show his appreciation, he'll be giving everyone here...
translation.it: Per mostrarvi il suo affetto, Justin darà a ognuno di voi

translation.en: a free Q-Bot Gen 6!
It's the best day of my life!
Oh, yes!
He signed me! [laughs hysterically]
-[alert beeping] -Oh, no.
-Dr. Tanner Rice. -[Dr. Rice yelps]
-Justin. -You weren't at the launch.
Was that today? Sorry about that. Just fixing some last-minute...
translation.it: Come? Era oggi? Scusami. Facevo delle correzioni.

translation.en: Yeah, bugs with the data, software, production line.
translation.it: Sai, bug nei dati, nel software, nella linea di produzione.

translation.en: Yeah, I'm just thinking, we don't want to release the Gen 6 too early.
translation.it: Forse dovremmo aspettare a rilasciare il Gen 6.

translation.en: Hey, Ares. [stuttering] How's it hanging?
I mean, uh...
Hey, maybe a little more product testing. You know? For safety.
translation.it: Magari potremmo fare qualche altro test, per sicurezza.

translation.en: [Justin] No, I understand that. The Gen 6 is your baby after all.
translation.it: Capisco. Il Gen 6 è una tua creazione.

translation.en: [Dr. Rice] Well, I mean...
This one you did most of the updates.
translation.it: Questa generazione è più opera tua.

translation.en: -Definitely more your-- -You're a perfectionist and I get that.
translation.it: - Anzi, sicuramente... - Lo so, sei un perfezionista.

translation.en: I really do and I'm supportive. But realize, we've made something revolutionary here.
translation.it: E ti sostengo, ma devi capire che abbiamo creato qualcosa di rivoluzionario.

translation.en: Trust me. It's ready.
-Yeah, I just-- -Come on, say it.
-Well that's the thing-- -Say it.
It's ready.
See? Was that so hard?
-[Dr. Rice] Okay. -[flying robot] Is this a bad time?
What? No. Yes. Yes.
-This is a terrible time. -Okay. Well, got some bad news.
Your secret robot just walked out of your secret lab--
translation.it: Il tuo robot segreto se n'è andato.

translation.en: What? Shh! Is that a joke?
No, a joke would be, "Why did a secret robot cross the road?"
translation.it: No, uno scherzo sarebbe: "Sai cosa ci fa un robot in strada"?

translation.en: -It's less of a joke, but-- -Not now.
translation.it: - Non so come finire. - Non ora.

translation.en: Wait, there's another one. Knock, knock.
Oh! Oh, my--
All right then, you're doing okay. I will leave you to it.
translation.it: Bene, sembra che te la cavi, quindi me ne vado.

translation.en: [P.A.] The red zone is for immediate loading and off-loading of passengers and robots only.
translation.it: La zona rossa è per il carico e scarico di passeggeri e robot.

translation.en: No parking.
What is that?
[P.A.] The red zone is for immediate loading and off-loading of passengers and robots only.
translation.it: La zona rossa è per il carico e scarico di passeggeri e robot.

translation.en: No parking.
[Molly] Didn't you have a backpack, honey?
Listen, champ. You're definitely not allowed out here.
translation.it: Senti, tu non puoi stare qui fuori.

translation.en: That girl needs this bag. We're going to hang out,
translation.it: Alla ragazza serve lo zaino. Diventeremo amici e condivideremo

translation.en: become best buds and share a meaningful journey of discovery.
translation.it: Alla ragazza serve lo zaino. Diventeremo amici e condivideremo i nostri viaggi di scoperta.

translation.en: [security robot] Why don't we go ahead and get you back inside?
translation.it: Perché non te ne torni dentro?

translation.en: -[security robot] Protocol's the word. Come on.
[security] Oh, that's interesting.
[big robot] I'm delusional.
Uhm... Fellas, I think we're going to need some backup.
[police dispatcher] Attention GHP units. Please be advised, unidentified robot on CS-101
translation.it: Attenzione, unità GHP. Robot non identificato sulla CS101

translation.en: moving west in high speed.
All units are assumed to apprehend.
Units 14 and 18 responding.
[officer] You are in violation of traffic offense.
translation.it: Hai violato il codice della strada.

translation.en: Pull over immediately and submit.
-But there's a tiny pointed horse in here! -Irrelevant.
translation.it: - C'è un cavallino a punta. - Irrilevante.

translation.en: [officer] Pull over immediately and--
[officer] Pull over immediately. You are in violation of major--
[officer] You are in violation--
[low-pitched vehicle] The Department of Freeland Security
translation.it: Il dipartimento di sicurezza ha autorizzato l'uso della forza.

translation.en: has authorized the use of deadly force. Stop engine and power down immediately.
translation.it: Il dipartimento di sicurezza ha autorizzato l'uso della forza. Ferma subito il motore.

translation.en: [low-pitched vehicle] Cease and desist.
[motherboard] Core memory, fatal error. Current memory will fill in 72 hours.
translation.it: Memoria centrale, errore fatale. La memoria si riempirà fra 72 ore.

translation.en: Error code: Bio HT816.
Contact your local IQ Geek Kit to recycle this robot
translation.it: Contatta l'assistenza per riciclare il presente robot e presta

translation.en: and please be more careful in the future.
translation.it: Contatta l'assistenza per riciclare il presente robot e presta più attenzione in futuro.

translation.en: Instead, it will conform to the geometry of its container.
translation.it: Si adatta alla geometria del suo contenitore.

translation.en: E.g. put it in a cup, it becomes a cup. Put it in a teapot, it becomes a teapot.
translation.it: Se lo mettete in una tazza, diventa una tazza, e così in una teiera.

translation.en: And this water equivalent...
-I'm going to barf! -[boy] Dude.
[girl] It's like limited edition.
Water can drift gently or it can crash violently.
translation.it: L'acqua può scorrere piano o infrangersi con violenza.

translation.en: This variability and flexibility is something we have to consider.
translation.it: Dobbiamo tenere conto di questa sua abilità.

translation.en: -Varying contexts demand varying behavior. -[sighs]
[Mai] S-Sorry.
[girl] No problem.
You on the school team?
-Who's asking? -I'm Ani.
It's nice to meet you. You know, officially.
We have physics together, but I sit behind you, so I don't think you've actually seen me.
translation.it: Sono dietro di te a fisica, ma credo tu non mi abbia mai vista.

translation.en: So... What?
Do you just hang out here? Are you...
translation.it: Te ne stai qui? Sei forse

translation.en: weird or something?
Yeah, maybe. I guess.
I come out to read. All the time, actu--
-Passing lane. -[big boy] Out of the way.
[girl] That's right.
[boy] Yeah, move it.
Why'd you nerds think you can hang out on my field?
translation.it: I nerd non possono stare qui.

translation.en: It's not your field, Greenwood!
translation.it: Questo campo non è tuo, Greenwood.

translation.en: -[girl] Yeah, it is. -Really?
-[boy] She doesn't even have a Q-Bot. -Hey, who taught you how to play?
translation.it: - Non ha un Q-Bot. - Chi ti ha insegnato a giocare?

translation.en: Was it your dad?
[Greenwood] Oh, yeah. He's gone, isn't he?
Okay, East Lake Energy. Passing drills. Come on, move it.
translation.it: Bene, East Lake Energy. Passaggi. - Muoversi. - Li abbiamo fatti ieri.

translation.en: [boy] We did those yesterday.
Hey, Mai. Why don't we get out-- Oh, okay. There she goes.
translation.it: Ehi, Mai, perché non... Oh, ecco che parte.

translation.en: Yo, Greenwood.
What was that?
Take her down.
[Q-Bot] Copy that.
-[girl] It's going down now. -Ma'am, if you'll allow me.
-You just try it. -[kid] Go get her.
Smash her!
I'm told that if you go limp, you'll sustain less damage as we beat you.
translation.it: Dicono che se ti afflosci fa meno male mentre ti picchiamo.

translation.en: -Good luck. -[kid] Come on, bring it!
Robots.
-Nope. -[toilet] Oh, come on!
You've got mail, you've got mail, you've got mail, you've got--
translation.it: C'è posta per te. C'è posta per te. C'è...

translation.en: mail.
[door] Hey, good afternoon, Mai. I bet you had a great day.
translation.it: GENERA SALUTO Buonasera, Mai. Scommetto che va alla grande.

translation.en: -You like... -Die in a fire.
[door] Okie dokie, good talk.
Not now, Momo.
[Molly] Mai? I'm almost done, then I'll fix dinner.
translation.it: Mai? Ho quasi finito e poi cucino.

translation.en: [Q-Bot] Gravity is your friend.
Look out, here comes a black-horned rhino!
translation.it: Attenta, arriva il rinoceronte dal corno nero.

translation.en: How was your day?
[Mai] I killed a man for his boots. That's great, honey. That's great.
translation.it: - Ho ucciso un uomo per i suoi stivali. - Ottimo tesoro.

translation.en: [bowl singing] It's noodle time! I can't wait for--
translation.it: È ora dei noodle! Non vedo l'ora di...

translation.en: [bowl] Mm. It's good, right?
Stupid! [groans]
[Q-Bot] Stroke, stroke.
Mai, honey?
I said I was making dinner.
I'm not hungry, Mom.
Oh, so that's how it is?
Are you going to at least look at me when you're being all teenagery?
translation.it: Non mi guardi nemmeno e fai l'adolescente arrabbiata?

translation.en: [Mai] Okay, I am sorry.
Can I go now?
What happened?
I had a really bad day, okay?
Those kids are making fun of you again?
translation.it: Ti hanno presa ancora in giro?

translation.en: I know. It's hard.
I feel alone sometimes too,
translation.it: Anch'io a volte mi sento sola,

translation.en: but only sometimes.
You know why, right?
You're never alone when you've got a Q-Bot!
translation.it: Non sei da sola se hai con te il tuo Q-Bot!

translation.en: Don't you understand anything?
Mmm... Sandlewood.
Hey there, Molly. I've finish the vacuuming.
There's a rather lovely Merlot and a piping hot lava cake waiting.
translation.it: Ti aspetta un buon Merlot e un tortino al cioccolato.

translation.en: Maybe a foot rub later?
Let's see, are we missing anything?
We both are.
You understand me, don't you, buddy? You understand my unfocused rage. Yeah, you do.
translation.it: Tu mi capisci, vero? Capisci la mia rabbia generalizzata.

translation.en: Yeah, you're the only one who gets my rage.
[Alfredo] Thanks for going through the garbage.
translation.it: Grazie per aver cercato nella spazzatura.

translation.en: Oh, no problem at all, Dr. Rice. My pleasure.
translation.it: Nessun problema, Dr. Rice, è un piacere.

translation.en: [door] Wow, thank you for opening me!
Oh, look out. Here I go closing.
[in English] Get the [bleep] out here. I will bite your head off, [bleep].
translation.it: FRANCESE INGLESE Ti stacco la testa a morsi.

translation.en: This is Momo's house!
[robot] Hello, small rodent. Small who?
translation.it: - Ciao, piccolo roditore. - Piccolo a chi?

translation.en: Momo, quit it! Get in here.
What? You again?
My bag! What are you doing here?
translation.it: Il mio zaino. Che ci fai qui?

translation.en: -Who even are you? -I'm the stupid robot.
translation.it: - Chi sei? - Sono lo Stupido robot.

translation.en: That may be the only honest thing I've ever heard a robot say, actually.
translation.it: Questa è l'unica cosa onesta che abbia sentito dire da un robot.

translation.en: But, you've got to go. I have bigger problems to deal with.
translation.it: Ma devi andartene, ho problemi più grossi da risolvere.

translation.en: I don't want you here.
Don't you-- Don't you get it?
I hate robots!
I really enjoyed looking through your personal belongings.
translation.it: Mi è piaciuto guardare i tuoi effetti personali.

translation.en: You're still super creepy.
Would you please just go?
[Molly] Mai, don't forget to brush your teeth before bed.
translation.it: Mai, ricorda di lavare i denti prima di dormire.

translation.en: Four out of five dentists recommend me!
translation.it: Quattro dentisti su cinque mi raccomandano.

translation.en: Stupid parental settings!
[brush] Floss twice a day.
Tartar kills. Floss.
Holy mother of toast!
Wait, wait, wait! Wait a second.
What was that exactly?
A phased plasma rifle in the 40GW range.
translation.it: Un fucile al plasma fasico dal raggio di 40 GW.

translation.en: -Are you sure that's legal? -Legal?
So, why'd you track me down again?
You said you needed your bag.
Well, what do you say we make a deal?
translation.it: Che dici se facciamo un accordo?

translation.en: I don't know. What do I say?
Okay, listen. You're gonna stay here tonight.
Understand?
Stay.
Not you, Momo.
I knew that. You judging me, bro?
I can keep this?
Well, if you do me a solid.
You can keep it.
-Come on, Momo. -He's judging me.
Now, get some rest or whatever it is that robots do.
translation.it: Riposati, o fai quel che fanno i robot.

translation.en: We're going to have a big day tomorrow.
[Momo] You see that? I see you judging me!
translation.it: Hai visto? Tu mi stai giudicando.

translation.en: [motherboard] Warning. Current memory will fill in 48 hours.
translation.it: Attenzione: la memoria si riempirà fra 48 ore.

translation.en: Recommendation: delete overflow memory to clear space and avoid input lock.
translation.it: Consiglio: cancellare i ricordi in eccesso per liberare spazio ed evitare il blocco.

translation.en: Who's out there? I swear, [bleep].
I will bite your head off--
Space cleared. Warning: core memory fail error.
translation.it: Spazio liberato. Attenzione: errore fatale della memoria.

translation.en: Current memory will fill in 51 hours.
translation.it: La memoria corrente si riempirà fra 51 ore.

translation.en: You know I created you, right?
translation.it: Sai che ti ho creato io, vero?

translation.en: Oh, hey. Justin. Sorry.
[stuttering] Something-- Something wrong with the line?
Just wanted a little check in, that's all.
There was an incident today.
-On the freeway. -Oh, well then--
With an unsanctioned robot of your design.
translation.it: Con un robot non approvato di tua costruzione.

translation.en: I'm curious. Are we not giving you enough to do?
-No, no. -We're not?
Wait, I mean...
Yes. All right, look, okay. I can explain.
Don't bother, I like to think I've been pretty relaxed about your side projects.
translation.it: Credo di essere stato permissivo con i tuoi progetti.

translation.en: Yeah, I think it's just great that you keep pushing me.
translation.it: Trovo sia fantastico che tu voglia spingerti oltre.

translation.en: But I need you to be concentrating on the Gen 6.
-[robot] Hey, guys. -Remember, one in every home.
translation.it: - Ehi, ragazzi. - Ricorda: uno in ogni casa.

translation.en: No, I know, I know. My mind has been a little--
translation.it: Sì, lo so. Sono stato un po'...

translation.en: No more side projects, no more distractions.
-Think of that. -It won't be a problem anymore.
There you go.
The only robots I want making news, doctor, are the Q-Bots.
translation.it: Gli unici robot che devi creare sono i Q-Bot.

translation.en: Yeah, I just--
"One in every home."
-Show them what you've got. -What are you waiting for?
translation.it: - Mostra cosa sai fare. - Che aspetti?

translation.en: [girl] Almost there, come on.
Come on!
Take the shot!
What?
-What? -[kid] Who shot that?
[Mai] 'Sup, fools.
Have you got a short memory or something, Su?
[all Q-Bots] On the bright side, it's a really beautiful day for a beating.
translation.it: Il lato positivo è che oggi è un bel giorno per picchiare qualcuno.

translation.en: It sure is.
-Say the thing. -Oh, right.
You best not be stepping to me, bruh.
translation.it: Meglio che non mi ti metti contro, fra'.

translation.en: "Bruh?"
You think this is a game?
No, this is payback.
I mean, well, this is a game. But, you know.
translation.it: Insomma, è un gioco, ma sai...

translation.en: Whatever, get her off my field.
What do you say? Three rounds, nothing in the face?
Wow, nice catch.
-What was that? -What's going on?!
My robot!
[kid] Is this what karma feels like?
That's what I'm talking about. Woohoo!
Thank you.
Did I... do you a solid?
Is our deal done?
-We're not done. -We're not?
We're just getting started.
♪ I work hard but sleep a lot Let's live our lives and live 'em big ♪ ♪ 'Cause we only got one life to live I'm on a psychic safari ♪
[host] Welcome back to the big show!
It's me, Wang Nima.
-Thank you. -[woman] You're awesome, Justin!
We're back with IQ Robotic's CEO, Justin Pin.
translation.it: Siamo qui con l'a.d. della IQ Robotic, Justin Pin.

translation.en: Talking about this little guy, the new Q-Bot Gen 6.
translation.it: Parliamo di questo piccoletto, il nuovo Gen 6.

translation.en: Well, I know I'm going to run right out and pick mine up.
Oh, that's good.
Hey, Justin. Changing subject for a second,
-I have a question. -I'm all ears.
Have you heard about this robot rampage on the freeway?
translation.it: Hai sentito di quella furia robotica in autostrada?

translation.en: Word is, it looks like one of your robots was doing all the damage.
translation.it: Si dice che sia stata colpa di uno dei tuoi robot.

translation.en: Well, I mean, we've got a lot going on these days.
But yes, of course, I have heard about this tragic event.
translation.it: ma ho sentito di quanto accaduto.

translation.en: I've been assured by my people as well as the proper authorities,
this dangerous and counterfeit robot has been destroyed.
translation.it: quel pericoloso robot contraffatto è stato distrutto.

translation.en: It is 100%, definitely, you can take it to the bank, dead.
Oh, I see. It's dead. Oh, poor little guy.
-Play the clip! -What? I don't have-- Oh you--
translation.it: - Guardiamo la clip. - Cosa? Io non...

translation.en: [woman] What is happening? Oh!
Wow, this is-- I'm seeing this footage for the first time.
translation.it: È la prima volta che vedo questo filmato.

translation.en: That's very out of character for our robots. Don't you think?
translation.it: Non si comporta come i nostri robot, non credi?

translation.en: Oh, I mean look at that. That's not--
That's horrible.
So, you're telling me, it's not an IQ Robot?
translation.it: Quindi non è un robot della IQ?

translation.en: Oh, good Lord, no! No, our operation is perfect.
translation.it: No, certo che no. Le nostre operazioni sono perfette.

translation.en: -Oh. -Okay? I would never allow
something like that to come out of IQ.
translation.it: che una cosa simile uscisse dalla IQ.

translation.en: No, no, no. Besides, we're a little more into connecting people.
translation.it: E poi, noi vogliamo entrare in contatto con la gente,

translation.en: than taking them apart.
Give it up for Justin Pin, everybody.
-[man] Go Justin! -[girl] I love him!
And I was like, "You want a piece of [bleep]?"
translation.it: E io ho detto: "Vuoi vedertela con me?"

translation.en: And then, bam! Scrap metal! You don't [bleep] with Momo, son!
translation.it: E poi bang, rottame. Non si scherza con Momo.

translation.en: I love this [bleep] thing.
You know, there's something wrong with your small mammal.
translation.it: Il tuo mammifero ha qualcosa che non va.

translation.en: He likes you, no big deal.
-Have we met? -Oh, you don't remember me.
I don't remember you too, bruh.
-What's that? -Oh, this? This is nothing.
-Why do you ask? -[motherboard] Warning, memory low.
Anyway, goodnight.
Hey, is something wrong?
You should go to bed. Your mom will worry.
translation.it: Dovresti dormire, tua madre si preoccuperà.

translation.en: Nice try, dude. Come on, what's up?
[motherboard] Warning: current memory will fill in 18 hours.
translation.it: Attenzione: la memoria si riempirà fra 18 ore.

translation.en: Recommendation: clear space to avoid catastrophic system reset.
translation.it: Consiglio: liberare spazio per evitare un reset catastrofico del sistema.

translation.en: That sounds bad. Is that bad?
translation.it: Sembra una cosa brutta. Lo è?

translation.en: Well, I'm broken.
If my storage gets too full, I won't be able to make new memories
translation.it: Se la mia memoria si riempie, non potrò collezionare ricordi

translation.en: and my brain will shut down.
translation.it: e il mio cervello si spegnerà.

translation.en: Well what about that? Can't you get rid of all that stuff?
translation.it: Non puoi liberarti di questa roba?

translation.en: That stuff? No, those are my core systems.
translation.it: Quelli sono i sistemi di base.

translation.en: I'd gain storage, but I'd lose functionality.
Oh, man. That's rough. I'm sorry.
It's fine, I just delete a few memories every night.
translation.it: Tranquilla, cancello qualche ricordo ogni sera.

translation.en: -That way, I don't lose them all. -How do you know which to keep?
translation.it: - Così non li perdo tutti. - Come scegli quali tenere?

translation.en: Well, I keep the important ones.
But the real problem is, the more memories I make, the harder it is to choose what to forget.
translation.it: Ma più ricordi colleziono e più mi è difficile scegliere.

translation.en: Let me help.
I'm pretty sure there are things not worth remembering.
translation.it: Sono sicura che ci sono cose da dimenticare.

translation.en: Really?
Okay, then.
What would you delete if you had to choose?
Oh, wait. Play that one.
No, you're the stupid robot.
translation.it: No, tu sei lo stupido robot.

translation.en: There you go, delete that one.
But that memory's special.
We'd just met.
How come no one every told me I have an ugly mad face?
I can't delete that.
-It's you, Mai. -That's not me!
translation.it: - Sei tu. - Quella non sono io!

translation.en: If you delete that memory, I'll still be here.
translation.it: Se lo cancelli, io sarò ancora qui.

translation.en: We can make some other ones, it'll be cool. Trust me.
translation.it: Possiamo farne di nuovi, sarà bello, fidati.

translation.en: I trust you.
-[buzz] -[motherboard] Space cleared.
Does it hurt?
I don't know.
Once it's gone, there's nothing. Like it was never there.
translation.it: Prima c'è e poi niente, quasi non ci fosse mai stato.

translation.en: Like it was never there.
translation.it: Quasi non ci fosse mai stato.

translation.en: I'm being selfish. What about...
-Enough! -Don't. Matthew!
Mai, are you okay?
Are you hurt?
What? No, it's fine.
-[bottle shatters] -Goodnight, I guess.
Hey, keep it real, yo.
You too. Keep it real.
[Justin] Do you recognize this?
So, I'm just curious. You made this, right? All by yourself, in your free time?
translation.it: Sono curioso, l'hai fatto tu? Da solo, nel tempo libero?

translation.en: Look, I'm not mad about this. I mean, it's pretty cool, right there.
translation.it: Senti, non sono arrabbiato. È piuttosto interessante.

translation.en: I could really use a robot like that.
I mean you betrayed me and I have to kill you now
translation.it: Mi hai tradito e dovrei ucciderti,

translation.en: but I could-- No, no. Can you stop? Please, just listen.
translation.it: ma se stai zitto. Ti prego, limitati ad ascoltare.

translation.en: I can't understand what you're saying. You know what, never mind.
translation.it: Non capisco cosa dici. Non fa niente.

translation.en: He's alive. He's not dead.
I mean, I could find the robot.
I could tap into the Q-Bot video feed, so we could see everything they all do.
translation.it: Posso accedere alle registrazioni dei Q-Bot.

translation.en: All the Q-Bots everywhere. They'll be our eyes.
translation.it: Di tutti quanti. Saranno i nostri occhi.

translation.en: I'll find it!
One second.
Guys...
Let's do that then.
-[robot] Hello, small rodent. -[Momo yells]
-Good morning, Mai. -Oh! Hey, dude.
Woah, nice.
All right, so what do you want to do today?
We have a lot of options.
Hey, what's that?
This? A baseball bat.
What's it for?
You know, for hitting baseballs. It's a game.
translation.it: Per colpire le palle. È un gioco.

translation.en: -Do people get hurt in baseball? -Depends on who's playing.
translation.it: La gente si fa male nel baseball? Dipende da chi gioca.

translation.en: -Mai, I was thinking-- -[Mai] Hmm?
Well, maybe you and me, maybe we could play a game today.
translation.it: magari io e te potremmo fare un gioco oggi.

translation.en: You need to teach me. Maybe not baseball, probably, but...
translation.it: Puoi insegnarmene uno. Magari non il baseball, ma...

translation.en: Soccer or something? Something like that.
Why?
Oh, I just mean. What if...
We do one day where we don't, you know, blow stuff up.
translation.it: Stare un giorno senza far esplodere cose.

translation.en: Aren't you having a good time?
translation.it: Non ti diverti? Pensavo ti piacesse

translation.en: I thought we were having a good time just hanging out.
translation.it: Non ti diverti? Pensavo ti piacesse fare cose con me.

translation.en: No, no, we are. Are you kidding? It's the best.
I really like hanging out.
It's been great, I have lots of cool memories now
translation.it: È stato bello, ho tanti bei ricordi

translation.en: -of us hanging out. -Okay, so why do you want to bail?
translation.it: - di noi due. - E allora perché smettere?

translation.en: -I don't! -Because we can't quit now.
translation.it: - Non è così. - Non possiamo smettere ora,

translation.en: There's way to much injustice in the world.
translation.it: - Non è così. - Non possiamo smettere ora, c'è troppa ingiustizia nel mondo. Insieme possiamo vincerla.

translation.en: Like, together we can fix it.
translation.it: c'è troppa ingiustizia nel mondo. Insieme possiamo vincerla.

translation.en: So, nobody has to get hurt ever again.
translation.it: Così nessuno si farà più male.

translation.en: I would never let you get hurt.
Well, there you go. See?
[Dr. Rice] He's alive. Find the robot. He's alive. Find the robot.
Oh, of course! Find the girl, then I find the robot.
translation.it: Ma certo. Trova la ragazza e troverai il robot.

translation.en: [robot] Oh, they put a pizza place there.
[singing along] ♪ Don't you know it's noodle time ♪
translation.it: Non sai che è ora dei noodle?

translation.en: ♪ It's noodle ti-- ♪
-Coming through. -Ah!
Bye! Hey, why are you so mean to everyone?
translation.it: - Ciao! - Perché sei cattiva con tutti?

translation.en: Apologize.
Please accept my apologies, ma'am. She's quite the scamp, I dare say.
translation.it: Accetti le mie scuse, signora. È davvero una monella.

translation.en: Well, I guess it's no problem, really.
Again, so sorry.
Don't worry. I got this.
No, Mai. Really it's okay.
translation.it: No, Mai, davvero. È tutto ok.

translation.en: -You don't have to do this. -You want to try that again, Greenwood?
translation.it: - Non devi farlo. - Vuoi riprovarci, Greenwood?

translation.en: Oh. Hello, Mai. Where's your little friend?
translation.it: Ciao, Mai. Dov'è il tuo amichetto?

translation.en: It's time you jokers learned we don't take no smack off of nobody.
translation.it: È ora che voi buffoni capiate che non potete prenderci a ceffoni.

translation.en: "Jokers?" "Smack?"
I totally understand what she's talking about.
-Oh, no. -Attack!
-[kid] Look out! -Hey, it's the girl.
[punk rock music playing] ♪ Noodles! Noodle time ♪
Do something! Let's go!
Stop it. That's not fair.
[Mai] That's what I'm talking about.
-Get 'em! -Me? Woah, take it easy.
What are you doing?
-Blast her! -[Greenwood and robot] What?
-I can't do that. -No, I didn't mean kill her.
translation.it: - Non posso farlo. - Non voglio ucciderla.

translation.en: You know, beat her up. Something.
I want her to hurt like how she hurt me.
translation.it: Voglio che soffra come ha fatto soffrire me.

translation.en: No, Mai. You don't want that.
I mean, she's just a kid like you.
translation.it: È solo una ragazzina, come te.

translation.en: Listen. I'm sorry, okay?
I wasn't doing anything.
What is wrong with you anyway, you crazy little freak? -[Mai grunts] -[Greenwood screams]
translation.it: Tu sei matta da legare, comunque.

translation.en: [robot] Why are you so angry?
[Mai] What do you know about it?
You're just a stupid robot.
[robot] Maybe you and Greenwood can be friends?
I thought...
I thought you were my friend.
I am. I am your friend.
-[clank] -Mai, wait!
[motherboard] Warning: current memory will fill in eight hours.
translation.it: Attenzione: la memoria si riempirà fra 8 ore.

translation.en: Recommendation: delete overflow memory to avoid catastrophic shut down.
translation.it: Consiglio: liberare la memoria per evitare spegnimento catastrofico.

translation.en: Seriously, you're running out of options here, buddy.
translation.it: Davvero, non hai più opzioni, amico.

translation.en: [Mai] You're just a stupid robot.
[Mai] Blast her!
[motherboard] You're about to delete the weapons control system.
translation.it: Stai cancellando il sistema controllo armi.

translation.en: This is a core system.
translation.it: Si tratta di un sistema di base.

translation.en: Weapons will be unavailable until full system reset.
translation.it: Le armi non saranno disponibili fino a reset completo.

translation.en: Are you sure you want to do this?
Yes.
Space cleared. Weapons inactive.
Hey, Mai.
You were right. I was able to delete my weapons and--
translation.it: Avevi ragione, sono riuscito a cancellare le armi e...

translation.en: [sighs] Was I wrong?
I guess he was just trying to help.
I don't know.
Look, you were wrong and he was right.
translation.it: Senti, tu avevi torto e lui ragione.

translation.en: I mean you were being a brat and he was trying to be a stand-up guy.
translation.it: Stavi facendo la viziata e lui la persona corretta.

translation.en: Good Lord, woman--
Sometimes, I think you're going to be my best and only friend forever.
translation.it: A volte penso che sarai il mio miglior amico per sempre.

translation.en: At least you'll never leave me. Will you, buddy?
translation.it: Almeno tu non mi lascerai mai, vero?

translation.en: No you won't. Oh, no you won't.
You know what, [bleep] that guy. He's dead to me.
translation.it: Sai che ti dico? Al diavolo, per me è morto.

translation.en: Oh! What's up, man?
How much did you just hear? Cause I was-- They were just jokes.
translation.it: Quanto hai sentito? Stavo solo scherzando.

translation.en: [robot] I made you a gift.
The most important parts of me... are the memories of you.
translation.it: Le parti più importanti di me sono ricordi di te.

translation.en: It hurts when I lose them.
You lost something too.
Listen,
would it help if I promise you I'll never let you down again?
translation.it: aiuterebbe se promettessi di non deluderti più?

translation.en: How can you promise something like that?
People leave and there's nothing you can do about it.
translation.it: La gente ti abbandona e non puoi farci nulla.

translation.en: I don't know. You're probably right.
I do know I don't want to lose you.
translation.it: Ma io so di non volerti perdere.

translation.en: Then, maybe...
don't lose me.
Mai, if I lost you, I'd be lost too.
translation.it: Mai, se ti perdessi, sarei perso anche io.

translation.en: So...
we cool?
-You got my back? -I do got your back.
translation.it: - Sei dalla mia parte? - Sono dalla tua parte.

translation.en: Then, yeah, we cool.
Mom, don't freak out.
Look, I can explain.
I think you'd better get your robot, young lady.
translation.it: Faresti meglio a chiamare il tuo robot, signorina.

translation.en: -[whirring] -Okay, okay.
Optical CRT intact.
Brachial prismatic joints are fine.
Motor responses...
This is where you removed your memory storage unit.
Uh-huh. I'm broken. Don't worry. I can fix it.
This chip contains a full system restore point.
translation.it: Questo chip contiene un salvataggio di ripristino

translation.en: A disc image from when I first created you.
translation.it: di com'eri quando ti ho creato.

translation.en: Run this and you'll be like new again. A fresh start.
translation.it: Attivalo e sarai come nuovo. Un nuovo inizio.

translation.en: Wait, a fresh start? Does that mean I lose my memories?
translation.it: Un nuovo inizio? Significa che perderò i ricordi?

translation.en: -Woah, hands off hippy! -Mai, don't be cute.
translation.it: - Giù le mani. - Mai, sii gentile.

translation.en: -Want to tell me what this is all about? -This is Dr. Rice, Mai,
translation.it: - Vuoi dirmi che succede? - Lui è il Dr. Rice

translation.en: and that's his Q-Bot.
No, no. This isn't a Q-Bot. This is-- He is...
translation.it: No, non è un Q-Bot. Lui è...

translation.en: something special. He has a purpose.
translation.it: Qualcosa di speciale, ha uno scopo.

translation.en: [Q-Bot] Oh, I didn't know we were expecting company.
-Can I offer you a lava ca-- -[electric shock]
translation.it: Le offrirei un tortino al cioccolato.

translation.en: Woah, what are you doing?
translation.it: Le offrirei un tortino al cioccolato. Che cosa fa?

translation.en: -Sorry, listen-- -[Q-Bot] Sandlewood.
Listen, something terrible is about to happen.
translation.it: Sta per succedere qualcosa di orribile.

translation.en: 7723 is our only hope stopping it. I designed him to stop it.
translation.it: 7723 è la nostra unica speranza, l'ho creato per fermare tutto.

translation.en: -I get it. He's a weapon. -What?
-Why would you put weapons in a robot? -Because it's awesome.
translation.it: - Perché armare un robot? - Perché è fichissimo.

translation.en: Awesome indeed.
I'm sorry, is now a bad time?
I mean, should I come back? I could always come back.
-Who is this? How'd you get in here? -Justin Pin?
translation.it: - Chi è? Com'è entrato? - Justin Pin.

translation.en: Oh, my gosh. I'm a huge fan, I'm your biggest fan.
translation.it: Oddio, sono una sua fan, la più grande.

translation.en: [chuckles] I'm a huge fan of you!
Ah, Dr, Tanner Rice here, really should be more careful with this secret project.
translation.it: Il Dr. Rice dovrebbe fare più attenzione ai suoi progetti segreti.

translation.en: -Well this has been really great but-- -Justin.
My old friend. If you're in there, please hear me.
translation.it: vecchio amico. Se ci sei, per favore ascoltami.

translation.en: Don't you remember the old days?
Come on. Dude, it was so awesome! I mean, building robots for the people.
translation.it: Andiamo, era fantastico. Costruire robot per le persone.

translation.en: Before Ares. Before all of this.
translation.it: Prima di Ares, prima di questo.

translation.en: -[Q-Bot] Foot rub later? -[Dr. Rice] Come on. This isn't us.
Seriously, when did making the world a better place become killing people?
translation.it: Quand'è che hai smesso di rendere il mondo migliore per uccidere la gente?

translation.en: I actually think "killing people" is making the world a better place.
translation.it: Credo che "uccidere la gente" sia rendere il mondo migliore,

translation.en: But I'm glad that we have this out in the open.
Secrets hurt after all, right?
I think he wants to kill us.
Oh, no, no. Not you per say, but just people in general.
translation.it: Oh, no, non voi, la gente in generale.

translation.en: I want to kill them, all of them. Most of them.
Whatever. Look, don't worry. Once it gets rolling,
thinks will be happening really quickly.
Boom, boom, boom. Trust me, it will be fine.
-Justin Pin's a bad guy? -That explains a lot actually.
translation.it: - Justin Pin è un cattivo? - Spiega un sacco di cose.

translation.en: But he's messing with the wrong cute little robot.
translation.it: Ma se l'è presa con il robottino sbagliato.

translation.en: -Blast them! -I'm sorry, Mai. But I can't.
translation.it: - Spara. - Scusa, Mai, ma non posso.

translation.en: -What? -I--
-[swoosh] -[Molly] Mai, what is going on here?
You know what? That is a great question.
What is he doing?
[Mai] Use your guns! Use your plasma thingy.
translation.it: Usa i fucili. La plasma qualcosa.

translation.en: Get back, it's not safe.
-Uh-oh. -Okay, fine.
Whose dog is this?
[Q-Bot] Hey, guys.
Did he just explode? We gotta go back, we gotta get mom.
translation.it: È esploso? Dobbiamo tornare a salvare la mamma.

translation.en: -Mai! -Mom.
[Molly] Mai!
-[army robot] Surround the target. -Why aren't you stopping to help her?
translation.it: - Circondare l'obiettivo. - Che fai? Perché non l'aiuti?

translation.en: Wow, what a scuffle. It looks--
Put me down! Stop, just stop!
What is wrong with you?
They took my mom!
I'm sorry, I couldn't stop them.
This is how you got my back?
translation.it: È così che stai dalla mia parte?

translation.en: I thought you were some kind of superhero.
translation.it: Pensavo fossi una specie di supereroe.

translation.en: But you just stood by and let them take her.
translation.it: Ma sei rimasto fermo mentre la prendevano.

translation.en: -You let them. -I didn't let them.
I had nothing to fight them with.
-What? -I deleted my weapon control systems.
translation.it: - Cosa? - Ho cancellato il sistema armi.

translation.en: What? Why would you do that?
Because I was out of memory.
There was nothing I could delete that wasn't you.
Okay, so your precious robot memories
translation.it: Quindi i tuoi preziosi ricordi di robot

translation.en: are more important than my mother's life? Is that it?
translation.it: sono più importanti della vita di mia madre, è questo?

translation.en: Is that what you're saying?
I hope that's not what you're saying.
I know I messed up,
but I had no choice. I had to save you.
translation.it: ma non avevo scelta, dovevo salvarti.

translation.en: I can't lose you, Mai.
My parents are gone.
The second I believe this thing between us is real
translation.it: Se credo che questa cosa tra noi è vera,

translation.en: you burn it down to the ground like everyone else does!
translation.it: tu rovinerai tutto, come tutti gli altri.

translation.en: Look, remember this.
I'm bailing first.
You okay, kiddo?
-I have you now, princess. -No!
-Get your hands off me. -Okay, come on--
translation.it: - Toglimi le mani di dosso. - Su, andiamo.

translation.en: Mai, don't do this by yourself.
-I don't need you. -Come on. Just listen to me.
translation.it: - Non ho bisogno di te. - Ascoltami.

translation.en: Hi, you are in violation--
-Please stop fighting me. -[robot] Huh.
Mai, I'm trying to help.
[sarcastically] Oh, good! Weapons would help. Did you bring any weapons this time?
translation.it: Dovevi tenere le armi, allora. Ne hai, stavolta?

translation.en: -It doesn't work like that. -I don't know about you,
translation.it: - Non funziona così. - Non so tu,

translation.en: but a rocket launcher would make me feel a whole lot better.
translation.it: ma io mi sentirei meglio con un lanciarazzi.

translation.en: [7723] If I brought my weapons back online,
the process would purge my entire memory.
translation.it: il processo formatterebbe tutta la memoria.

translation.en: I'd forget everything I've ever learned.
[sarcastically] Oh, real tragedy.
-I wouldn't know who to fight anymore. -Whatever, I can fight alone.
translation.it: - Non saprei nemmeno combattere. - Fa' niente, lo farò da sola.

translation.en: -I've been doing it my whole life. -You are not alone!
translation.it: - Come sempre. - Tu non sei sola!

translation.en: I'm always alone. This time-- -[sirens wailing] -This time's no different.
translation.it: Io sono sempre sola. Stavolta non è diverso.

translation.en: [security robot] You are now surrounded--
You're right. I let you down.
A lot of people let you down, but you are not alone.
translation.it: Molte persone ti deludono, ma non sei sola.

translation.en: [Mai] If I'm not alone that means I've brought you down into my garbage life.
translation.it: Se non sono sola significa che ti ho trascinato giù con me.

translation.en: Is that really where you want to be?
translation.it: Davvero vuoi stare qui con me?

translation.en: [7723] Nowhere else.
I miss him.
Everyday.
And everyday, I'm mad at him for leaving.
translation.it: E ogni giorno sono arrabbiata perché ci ha lasciate.

translation.en: Look at us.
Quite a team we make-- A broken robot and a broken little girl.
translation.it: Che bella squadra, un robot e una ragazza danneggiati.

translation.en: It's more than I could have ever asked for.
What do you say we go and get your mother? Together?
translation.it: Andiamo a salvare tua madre insieme.

translation.en: We're going to get our butts kicked without your weapons.
-You know that, don't you? -Oh, yeah for sure.
[security robots] Violation. Alert. Alert.
-[7723] Let's go. Come on. -[sirens wailing]
-Momo! -What?
Alert. Alert.
-Hold up! You guys hear that? -[indistinct conversation in distance]
-Momo, shh! -[7723] Wait.
-[Momo] She's that way! -Momo said she's this way, come on.
translation.it: - È da quella parte. - Momo dice che è di là.

translation.en: Wait, Momo says?
"Momo says?"
I don't need that. I have a copy of that. All right, maybe I can try that. Where did I see--
translation.it: Non mi serve, ne ho una copia. Va bene, posso provarci. Dove ho visto...

translation.en: Where did I put it, I know I-- I have money.
translation.it: Dove l'ho messo... Ho dei soldi.

translation.en: Oh, you're here. We're saved!
Hey, hey! Guys, wait. Oh, goodness.
Where's my mom, nerd shirt?
translation.it: Dov'è mia madre, razza di nerd?

translation.en: Ignore that, that's a trap.
-There's no way I'll ignore that. -No, listen.
We can save your mother.
We can save everybody, but we have to stop Ares to do it.
translation.it: Possiamo salvare tutti, ma dobbiamo fermare Ares.

translation.en: What? Who cares about Ares if that Justin Pin guy is the problem?
translation.it: Il problema è Justin Pin, non Ares.

translation.en: No, you don't understand. It's not Pin.
translation.it: No, non capisci, lui non è Pin.

translation.en: He isn't...
I mean he...
He lost all patience for tedious backstory?
These guys again?
I think that's just about enough, Dr. Tanner Rice.
translation.it: Credo sia abbastanza, Dr. Tanner Rice.

translation.en: Tell me where you're keeping my mother!
Oh, right. The human woman. Oh my gosh.
translation.it: Oh, giusto. La donna umana. Oddio.

translation.en: I had created the perfect trap for you guys.
-Hold up. -What?
What do you mean human woman?
What? What do you mean, what do I mean?
I mean, who talks like that?
Normal humans do. [chuckles nervously] [stuttering] I mean, I do. Because I do normal human things
translation.it: Un normale essere umano, perché faccio normali cose umane

translation.en: all the time. All the time.
Literally, you could ask any other human if I--
translation.it: Puoi chiedere a chiunque altro umano.

translation.en: You won't get away with this. He can't hide forever.
translation.it: Non la farai franca, non puoi nasconderti per sempre.

translation.en: -You know, people will find out-- -[zapping]
-You know what, never mind. -No!
translation.it: - Sai cosa? Non fa niente. - No!

translation.en: [robot, low-pitched voice] Now it's time to finish this. [flying robot] All right, Dr. Rice. Time to go.
translation.it: - Ora la facciamo finita. - Giusto, Dr. Rice, è ora di andare.

translation.en: You said two minutes, it's been two minutes.
translation.it: Ha detto due minuti e sono passati.

translation.en: Oh, hey Ares.
[Mai] Nope.
-Give me a D! -[blast]
-[man] It's Justin! -[crowd whooping]
[7723] Oh, come on...
-[robot] So, then I go back and get him-- -[Mai] Go get the cops!
translation.it: - Torno e prendo... - Chiama la polizia.

translation.en: But Dr. Rice is dead. I have to take some time to process this.
translation.it: Il Dr. Rice è morto, dammi tempo per digerire la cosa.

translation.en: Okay, get the cops. Get the cops.
Mom!
Momo, come on!
-[muffled] -Mom, are you okay?
Oh, Mai. My baby!
-Mom-- -I'm so sorry.
I should've paid more attention. You felt so all alone.
translation.it: avrei dovuto darti più attenzioni. Ti sentivi sola

translation.en: I should've given you a hug, but I was alone too
and thought robots were my answer. But you're my answer!
translation.it: ma mi sentivo sola e mi sono buttata sui robot.

translation.en: I hope that I'm your answer. You were so right and I was wrong.
translation.it: Ma sei tu ciò che conta e spero che io conti per te.

translation.en: I love you so, so much!
Wow, yeah. I love you too.
But listen, Pin wants to kill all these people
translation.it: Ma ascolta, Pin vuole uccidere tutti.

translation.en: you need to help me get them out of here.
They're never going to believe you.
I am a beloved public figure.
translation.it: Io sono una stimata figura pubblica.

translation.en: And they do whatever I want them to.
translation.it: E loro fanno ciò che voglio.

translation.en: [echoing over P.A.] These morons are lining up to pay for the bombs
translation.it: Questi imbecilli sono in fila per comprare le bombe

translation.en: I'm going to use to kill-- Hold on, wait a second.
translation.it: che userò per ucciderli. Un attimo.

translation.en: Am I...
Am I hearing an echo?
Hello. Do you guys hear that? Can anyone else hear an echo?
Give me that!
[Mai] All of you, listen, now!
The Q-Bots are bombs!
Head for the exits. Why is no one running?
Run, right now! Get away while you can!
Ah! You. Are. A. Mean. Puppet!
Oh, why did you do that? [low-pitched] I'm just trying to help!
translation.it: Perché l'hai fatto? Cercavo di aiutare!

translation.en: Okay, fine! I killed Justin Pin and stole his body. Boo!
translation.it: E va bene, ho ucciso Justin Pin e preso il controllo del suo corpo.

translation.en: [Justin and Ares voices in unison] "Boo-hoo!" Shut up!
The guy's dead. Get over it!
You know what he said to me? "You're perfect," he said.
"Now go make the world perfect."
You want the world to be a better place?
You humans are what's wrong with it.
-You're flawed and you're broken. -Keep talking, crazy pants.
[Justin] The only way this world gets perfect...
is with all of you dead!
Maybe I'll start with killing this one?
Get your hands off of her!
Put your [bleep] finger on my daughter--
[Ares] I guess I don't have to wear the man's suit anymore.
translation.it: Non devo più indossare il costume da uomo.

translation.en: Let's just scrub ahead to the everyone dies part, shall we?
translation.it: Passiamo subito alla parte in cui muoiono tutti, eh?

translation.en: Have at it!
Don't leave yet. [zapping]
Oh, snap!
-Momo, come on. -[barks]
-You just lost a very loyal customer! -Okay, Mom.
translation.it: - Hai perso una cliente. - Dai, mamma.

translation.en: [Justin] Every home. Gorgeous.
Oh, my god! Mai, I've never felt so close to you.
translation.it: Oddio, Mai, mi sento così vicina a te.

translation.en: -Ah! Mai! -Mom!
-[Greenwood] Ah! Stay away, you freaks! -[Mai] Heads up!
[Greenwood] That was amazing!
-Yeah, cool. -Mai, I'm sorry about what happened.
translation.it: - Sì, forte. - Senti, mi dispiace di tutto.

translation.en: Okay? I didn't mean to hurt you or anybody.
-And I know you weren't-- -Can we do this later?
translation.it: - E non sapevo fossi... - Finiamo dopo?

translation.en: All right, okay.
[Mai] Follow me, it's our last chance!
translation.it: Seguimi, è la nostra ultima chance.

translation.en: [man] Look out! Hurry up!
[Mai] Come on!
-Mai, what are you doing? Come on! -I'm going back for them.
translation.it: Mai, che fai? Torno a prenderli.

translation.en: Hello, pr-pr-princess.
You don't have to fight.
It never stops...
and it never fixes anything.
[Ares] You have been ruined by that human child.
Humans are the imperfection I mean to correct.
translation.it: Gli umani sono le imperfezioni che devo correggere.

translation.en: No one is perfect!
[Ares] I am!
[Ares] Don't you get it? You're as broken as they are.
translation.it: Non capisci? Sei danneggiato come loro.

translation.en: But my world... My world will be perfect.
No more pain, no more conflict.
No more injustice.
No humanity.
You are very evil.
[Ares] Ah, agree to disagree.
Oh, hey. Look what the meat puppet dragged in.
translation.it: Guarda cos'ha portato il pupazzo di carne.

translation.en: You are not ruining this for me.
[Greenwood] Let her go, you weird old dude.
-Don't make me kick your butt. -Greenwood, what are you doing?
translation.it: - Non farmi arrabbiare. - Greenwood, che fai?

translation.en: Get out of here, go!
I am a stupid robot!
[motherboard] Warning, you are about to begin a full system reset.
translation.it: Pericolo: stai per effettuare un reset completo del sistema.

translation.en: All memories will be lost.
-Are you sure you want to do this? -[7723] Yes.
[motherboard] Beginning now. Memory deleted.
translation.it: Inizio procedura. Memoria cancellata. Armi disponibili.

translation.en: Weapons available.
[7723] I've got your back.
Holy crab stacks.
-Thank you. -Mai, listen to me.
Our memories make us who we are. Don't let the bad ones stop you from making good ones.
translation.it: I ricordi ci rendono ciò che siamo. Non smettere di crearne di belli.

translation.en: [slow-motion] What are you talking about?
[motherboard] Memories deleting.
Weapons restoring.
Are you okay?
Look out!
Your weapons...
[7723] You are amazing. Go make new memories.
translation.it: Sei fantastica. Va' e crea bei ricordi.

translation.en: [Ares] Stop wasting your time.
[Mai] What-- What are you...
[motherboard echoing] Memories deleting.
[motherboard] Full system reset successful, main memory initialized.
translation.it: Sistema ripristinato con successo. Inizializzazione memoria.

translation.en: Are you there?
Please come back. I'm-I'm sorry, I-I was wrong.
translation.it: Torna da me. Mi dispiace, avevo torto.

translation.en: Please, please. Don't be gone.
translation.it: Ti prego, non te ne andare.

translation.en: Aw, stop it.
You're going to make me cry.
Not really. [digital stutter] I'm kidding.
Move aside little human.
No, don't! Stay away from him.
translation.it: Non farlo, sta' lontano da lui.

translation.en: No! You do not get to touch him.
[Ares] What is it with you people? It's like you thrive on futility.
translation.it: Perché voi umani vi fissate con queste futilità?

translation.en: -[gun energizes] -There we go.
Oh, well.
Perfect.
What are you--
-Whose dog is this? -[Mai] He's mine!
translation.it: - Di chi è questo cane? - Mio.

translation.en: You stupid robot!
-What? -Don't!
You were trying to tell me and I...
Those memories were all you had and...
translation.it: Quei ricordi erano tutto ciò che avevi

translation.en: You gave them up, for me.
translation.it: e ci hai rinunciato per me.

translation.en: And I'm sorry.
Just please...
Don't be gone.
Hello. What's your name?
-I can keep this? -You can keep it.
Hey, Momo. This is Momo.
-He's a good guy, okay? -Okay.
translation.it: - È un buono, va bene? - D'accordo.

translation.en: -Hello, Momo. -S'up, buddy?
Hey, sweetie.
How's he doing?
Better.
I think.
It's okay, you're okay.
I've got your back.
"I got your back."
Oh, man.
What? I'm allergic to pollen. Are you judging me?
translation.it: Sono allergico al polline. Mi stai giudicando?

translation.en: -Hey, Mai. You ready? -Oh hey, dude!
You girls have fun now.
Come on, let's go.
Mai, what are you waiting for? You ready?
translation.it: Mai, dai, che stai aspettando? Sei pronta?

translation.en: [Momo] It's from generations of inbreeds. My ancestors were wolves, bruh.
translation.it: Sono un cavallo di razza, i miei antenati erano lupi.

translation.en: Come on!
[Greenwood] You can play too, but hurry it up.
-[girl] Bring it. -[boy] I'll be the goalie.
[Ani] Over here.
[Greenwood] You're good, but not as good as me.
translation.it: Sei brava, ma non quanto me.

translation.en: -Nice try. -I'm open!
[kid] He's so cool!
-What do you call him? -[Mai] My friend.
translation.it: Che forte. Come lo chiami? Amico.

translation.en: ♪ I forced my feet down to the floor ♪
